body:
DECLARE @IP VARCHAR(50) = '$CURSOR$'
IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.F01_ListIP WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE IP = @IP)
	BEGIN	
		INSERT INTO [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.F01_ListIP
			(
				 ID
			   , IP
			   , WarehouseCode
			   , WarehouseName
			   , Status
			   , Quantity
			   , OfficeCode
			   , OfficeName
			   , CreatedDate
			   , CreateBy
			   , IDOld
			   , LastUpdateDatetime
			   , LastUpdateBy
			   , Flag3G
			   , Remark
			)
		SELECT
				 I.ID
			   , I.IP
			   , I.WarehouseCode
			   , I.WarehouseName
			   , I.Status
			   , I.Quantity
			   , I.OfficeCode
			   , I.OfficeName
			   , I.CreatedDate
			   , I.CreateBy
			   , I.IDOld
			   , I.LastUpdateDatetime
			   , I.LastUpdateBy
			   , I.Flag3G
			   , I.Remark
		FROM
			[10.1.13.77].FRTInsideV2.dbo.F01_ListIP I WITH (NOLOCK)
				LEFT JOIN [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.F01_ListIP C WITH (NOLOCK)
					ON I.ID = C.ID
		WHERE
			C.ID IS NULL
			AND I.IP = @IP

		SELECT * FROM [10.1.13.76].FRTCRM.dbo.F01_ListIP WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE IP = @IP
	END
ELSE
	BEGIN
	    SELECT N'IP này đã được ADD.'
	END
